Name: Nova
Description:
Dominion covert operative. Can equip and use a variety of weapons and gear.

Can attack different enemy units based on weaponry.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Allows Nova to remain permanently cloaked.
Root.Name: Tactical Stealth Suit

Root.Tooltip: Advanced mobility gear with a jet pack that allows for cliff jumping.
Root.Name: Jump Suit

Root.Tooltip: Cloaks Nova for 30 seconds, preventing enemy units from seeing or attacking her. A cloaked unit will only be revealed by detectors or effects.
Root.Name: Cloak

Root.Tooltip: Teleports Nova to a nearby target location. Ability can only be used once every 8 seconds. Nova is cloaked for 10 seconds after teleporting.
Root.Name: Blink

Root.Tooltip: Gain control of target enemy unit. Can only control one target at a time. The control effect will continue until being cancelled. Virtual Mind Emulator will automatically control enemy armored units.
Root.Name: Virtual Mind Control

Root.Tooltip: Releases Nova's current Domination target, returning it to its original alliance.
Root.Name: Release Minion

Root.Tooltip: Reveals the locations of enemy units within a radius of 20 from Nova's position. Does not reveal cloaked or burrowed units.
Root.Name: Ghost Visor

Root.Tooltip: Increases Nova's vision and the range of her non-melee weapons by 2. Increases the range of Nova's melee weapons by 1.
Root.Name: Rangefinder Oculus

Root.Tooltip: Fire a psi-charged bullet at long range dealing 125 damage.
Root.Name: Snipe

Root.Tooltip: Rapidly jump to random enemies within 5 radius 1 times, attacking each of them for 45 damage. A single target can be hit more than once. Can target ground and air units.
Root.Name: Fury of One

Root.Tooltip: Fires a slow moving ball of plasma that deals 30 damage to enemies in its path and leaves behind a trail of plasma that damages enemies within it.
Root.Name: Plasma Shot

Root.Tooltip: Deals 50 (100 vs Light) damage to enemy ground units in a wide arc.Does not damage friendly units.
Root.Name: Penetrating Blast

Root.Tooltip: Dashes forward and deals 100 damage to enemy ground units in a straight line.Does not damage friendly units.
Root.Name: Dash Attack

Root.Tooltip: Instantly kill target enemy unit. Nova must move within melee range to execute the attack.
Root.Name: Break Neck

Root.Tooltip: Obliterate a group of enemies with a pulse of psionic energy dealing 50 damage
Root.Name: Pulse Grenades

Root.Tooltip: Increases Nova's attack speed and movement speeds by 50% for 10 seconds. Heals Nova for 200 life over the effect's duration.
Root.Name: Stim Infusion

Root.Tooltip: Stuns and disables the Detection of enemy ground and air units in the target area for 3 seconds.Massive units and friendly units are immune.
Root.Name: Flashbang Grenades

Root.Tooltip: Deploys a holographic duplicate of Nova that can be controlled. The hologram deals 25% of Nova's damage and takes 25% less damage.
Root.Name: Holo Decoy

Root.Tooltip: Calls down a Nuclear Strike at a target location. Nukes take 5 to land, but they deal up to 750 (+200 vs. structures) damage in a large radius.
Root.Name: Tac Nuke Strike

Root.Tooltip: Calls down a Nuclear Strike at a target location. Nukes take 5 to land, but they deal up to 750 (+200 vs. structures) damage in a large radius.
Root.Name: Tac Nuke Strike

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to holster their weapons and avoid engaging enemies, unless given a direct command. Units holding fire will flee if attacked.
Root.Name: Hold Fire

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to fire at will. They will engage enemy units within range and chase them as normal.
Root.Name: Weapons Free

Root.Tooltip: Psionic amplification suit. Increases both energy regeneration rate and maximum energy.
Root.Name: Apollo Infantry Suit

Abilities.Name: Nova - Weapon - Monomolecular Blade - Dash Attack
